ygData.subject: Re:  Treants
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh, you can kill treants very easily at low 20s, what I was saying you will not be able to since they are camped by players like crazy. Average life span of a
ygData.messageBody:
Oh, you can kill treants very easily at low 20s, what
I was saying you will not be able to since they are
camped by players like crazy. Average life span of a
treant is about 4 seconds before being nuked by the
various casters just waiting for them to spawn.

--- James Harless <jharless@...> wrote:
> You can fight treants solo as a necromancer. I was
> doing it around 30th,
> but, I'm sure you can do it earlier. I'm talking of
> the same 2 treant spawn
> that you are, I believe. Don't forget about Fear.
>
>
> > From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
> >
> > You can't fight treants solo.....they are camped
> by
> > players 24x7 :)
> >
> > --- Dino Buffetta <DBuffett@...> wrote:

> at
> > > 22nd now 23rd I have not con'ed any yet. But
> what
> > > lvl can a necro solo this GOODIE LOSERS. And
> maybe
> > > some tactics to fighting them. And also what lvl
> are
> > > the Millers in Q. hills my gnome necro friend
> told
> > > me that he went from 24th to 29th fighting them
> only
> > > (only problem he had was to get there spawn
> > > separated. I am a no wimpy necro I love to fght
> > > yellows and reds (SOLO).
